title: How to Clean Windows With the Best Homemade Window Cleaner

steps.headline: Fill an empty spray bottle with a solution of 1 cup white vinegar, 1 1/2 cups alcohol and 2 drops of dish soap.
Spray your window with this solution.
Scrub (if windows are really dirty) window with the sponge/scrubber side of a squeegee.
steps.description: This step is not necessary if the windows are not really dirty.

steps.headline: Using the rubber blade, squeegee the window from top to bottom.
steps.description: At the end of each down stroke, wipe the blade clean with a clean, lint-free rag.

text: Fill an empty spray bottle with a solution of 1 cup white vinegar, 1 1/2 cups alcohol and 2 drops of dish soap.  Spray your window with this solution.  Scrub (if windows are really dirty) window with the sponge/scrubber side of a squeegee. This step is not necessary if the windows are not really dirty. Using the rubber blade, squeegee the window from top to bottom. At the end of each down stroke, wipe the blade clean with a clean, lint-free rag. Enjoy your clean windows!  Finished.
